titleStmt.title: The second volume of Plutarch's Lives Translated from the Greek, by several hands.
Lives. English. Vol. II.
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jacob Tonson, at the Judges-Head in Chancery-Lane, near Fleet-Street,

notesStmt.note: A translation of the third volume of: Plutarchus. Vitae parallelae.
With additional engraved title page, reading: Plu:tarch Lives Vol: 2d.
With a final page of advertisements.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge.

place.placeName: the Judges-Head in Chancery-Lane, near Fleet-Street
